Package model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Player
extends Entity
implements java.io.Serializable
Class that represents an human player and their account
See Also:

    • load

      public static Player load​(java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String password) throws IncorrectPasswordException, SaveNotFoundException
      Loads and returns a Player object from a text file named after in which it was saved. Also checks if the password in input is the same password used for the Player object with the same nickname as the one in input.
      Parameters:
      nickname -
      password -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IncorrectPasswordException
      SaveNotFoundException
